live_updates: The local power company is still working on several downed lines in the area. Please follow this link for power outage updates : https://www.bchydro.com/power-outages/app/outage-map.html#outage=2116438
Our team is on site along BC Hydro working on repairs. We thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54739.summary: Some customers in Langley Township are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54739.title: Nov 2 - Langley Township | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience!
